mapper.insert: insert into t_g_properties_config (id, project_code, profile, pro_key, pro_value, remark, create_by, create_time, update_time, last_value, status, auditor, auditor_text) values (#{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{projectCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{profile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{proKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{proValue,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, now(), #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{lastValue,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{auditor,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{auditorText,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

insert into t_g_properties_config
id,
project_code,
profile,
pro_key,
pro_value,
remark,
create_by,
create_time,
update_time,
last_value,

#{projectCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

mapper.sql: id, project_code as projectCode, profile, pro_key as proKey, pro_value as proValue, remark, create_by as createBy, create_time as createTime, update_time as updateTime, last_value as lastValue, status, auditor, auditor_text as auditorText
mapper.select: select from t_g_properties_config where project_code = #{projectCode} and profile = #{profile} and pro_key = #{proKey}
mapper.update:
update t_g_properties_config set
pro_value = #{proValue,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
update_time = now(),
last_value = #{lastValue,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER},
auditor = #{auditor,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
auditor_text = #{auditorText,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
